message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to discuss the price with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $12000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to your business.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10000. Considering the product's unique features and benefits, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm offering the product to you for $11500. I believe this is a fair compromise that still reflects the value it brings to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $11000, but I think that's as high as I can go. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I understand your constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $11000. Considering the product's unique features and benefits, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm offering the product to you for $11250.
